title.value: The results of trial of 'VAN DOMMELE' threshing device in the line of flax primary treatment
Результаты испытаний обмолачивающего устройства в линии первичной переработки льна фирмы 'VAN DOMMELE'

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Levkin, M.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article presents methods and results of experimental re-search into the determination of the degree of flax heads thresh-ing by a threshing device with elastic working organ in the line of primary processing of flax of the firm 'Van Dommele', which helps to increase the degree of separation of flax heads by 18 %, the jagged surface of the working organ ensuring high-quality work of threshing device without mess in flax heap. It also makes stems more parallel.
